alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 09 at 7:51PM CST until February 10 at 7:30AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Illinois River near Tahlequah affecting Cherokee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River near Tahlequah. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, minor flooding occurs from near Hanging Rock downstream towards Tahlequah. Floating the river is too hazardous due to strong turbulence. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CST Thursday the stage was 11.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 11.2 feet just after midnight. It will then fall back below flood stage just late tonight. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
